descriptor.name: Eyewearlabs OKNO | Polarized Full Rim Rectangular Branded Stylish Sunglasses For Men & Women | 100% UV Protection Shades | Cricket Sports Cycling Driving | Medium | Victory Lanes | Hillcharge
descriptor.short_desc: POLARIZED LENSES  Eyewearlabs sunglasses are polarized and UV Protected. Polarized lenses can filter out sunlight reflected glare, and protect your eyes from long-term damage by blocking 100% of harmful UV rays. These lenses are Anti-Glare / Anti-Reflective and Crack Resistant, and are dust repellent.Frame Material: Aluminium Material l Flexible Light - Weight | Frame Size: LargeDESIGN - Balancing classic and trendy. Ideal for men. Since they are very light weight, you will not feel heavy or uncomfortable.PERFECT ALL ROUNDER  These Eyewearlabs sunglasses are the perfect choice for Daily wear, Outdoor sports and activities such as Travelling, Bike and car Drives, Cricket, Shopping and even taking selfies. They are suitable as a high fashion accessory that adds up to your style.Care Instructions - It is important to clean and maintain them regularly. Just wipe them with a microfiber cloth to keep your lenses pristine and smudge-free.PACKAGE INCLUDES  One Sunglass along with microfiber cloth and case.
